title: Intensive Financial Literacy Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental economic concepts and experience with everyday financial transactions
context.additional_context: Emphasizing practical financial knowledge that preservice teachers can deliver to future students

learning_goals: Establish and execute a three-month household budget plan using personal budget management tools
Analyze the risk-return structure of investment products and summarize them at a level explainable in educational settings
Perform loan interest rate comparisons and debt management simulations by applying basic credit management principles

resources: National Financial Literacy Survey Sample Materials

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
